data.what_is:
Complex omnichannel marketing campaigns made simple. With Deployteq, execute millions of unique customer interactions on a daily basis. Our powerful technology will help you cut through this multichannel mayhem and deliver hyper-personalised interactions that matter to every single customer.

Deployteq, which has been developed and maintained in-house for over 2 decades, has been the Netherlands' largest platform for successful marketing automation for many years now, with more than 3 billion emails sent per year. Deployteq automates the tedious tasks and simplifies the creation of beautiful campaigns. It has the ability to send segmented and personalised omnichannel messages via the right channel, to the right person, at the right time. We operate over multiple channels including Email, Mobile App, Whatsapp, SMS and many more, allowing you to contact your customer at every touchpoint of their journey.

Why choose Deployteq?

* Seamlessly coordinates omnichannel customer journeys for email, SMS, landing page, social and more

* With drag-and-drop functionality, you can easily build complex omnichannel customer journeys

* Create highly personalised content using detailed customer segments that you can create directly within the platform

* Enjoy access to the expert support team on our helpdesk, with their unlimited knowledge of Deployteq available to you 24/7

* In-built connector app store enables you to add extensive functionality on-the-fly and without technical support

* Watertight pre-flight testing capability for all customer programmes

* Real-time reporting dashboards let you monitor campaign success and push content at the right time and through the right channel

* 99.77% average deliverability rating and a guaranteed 'excellent reputation' among ISPs

* Seamlessly integrates with external platforms and social channels

* Fully configurable API connectors and plug-and-play solutions for data capture

* First tool in Europe to achieve full integration with Google's dynamic and interactive AMP email platform

* Incredibly cost-efficient compared to other platforms and can be implemented in days rather than weeks
data.product_description:
Users are empowered to self-serve global omnichannel campaigns, tailored to the behaviour and preferences of each individual customer.

Easily build campaigns and create fully connected customer experiences across channels on this single-view Marketing Automation Platform, which includes a simple drag-and-drop functionality, uses instantaneous segmentation and can integrate with any secure data source.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. 49 reviewers of Deployteq have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: As reported in 47 Deployteq reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: As reported in 46 Deployteq reviews. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: As reported in 50 Deployteq reviews. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. This feature was mentioned in 44 Deployteq reviews.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. This feature was mentioned in 49 Deployteq reviews.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies. This feature was mentioned in 43 Deployteq reviews.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: As reported in 45 Deployteq reviews. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: As reported in 45 Deployteq reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: As reported in 44 Deployteq reviews. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Sender Reputation Management

features.content: Based on 49 Deployteq reviews. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. 47 reviewers of Deployteq have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Lead Nurturing

initial_reviews.review_title: A low-effort tool to get high-quality, professional results
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
The tool features a drag-and-drop interface, which greatly simplifies the process of creating campaigns. Unlike other providers that may offer limited functionality or become overly complex, Deployteq offers a user-friendly solution for crafting personalised campaigns.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
The product exhibits a few glitches, yet notably fewer than those found with other providers we used.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
At many organisations, time is always of the essence. With lofty goals but limited resources, streamlining processes is crucial. Deployteq has been a game-changer for many. Its intuitive platform has allowed us to create personalised campaigns that align perfectly with brand guidelines in half the time it used to take with other providers. Thanks to Deployteq, we've been able to help organisations stand out from competitors and make the most of our resources.xl

initial_reviews.review_title: Sophisticated Marketing Automation tool for all Marketing Efforts
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
Deployteq is the most user-friendly Marketing Automation builder. The variety of options it has in terms of building an automation flow is intuitive. It offers a simple drag-and-drop marketing automation campaign editor which saves us a lot of time and effort. The triggers and filters they provide for building automation are truly commendable. The lead scoring model is also one of their super useful features.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
In terms of user experience, Deployteq is the best and in terms of the learning curve, Deployteq is easy to learn for all from freshers to experienced professionals. There are some areas where some improvements are much needed some of them are integration with other third-party software, there are some technical glitches we come across quite often. And the analytics part can be improved.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
Deployteq comes up with a ton of features at this price point, some of the features that are really beneficial for us are List Management, Lead segmentation, Subscriber management, and A/B testing. We have tried behaviour-based automation which was quite an interesting feature one should consider. Simply it offers a wide range of features when compared to other marketing automation tools.

initial_reviews.review_title: My all-time favourite software for omnichannel marketing automation and orchestration
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
The user-friendliness is amazing. It suits both beginners and experienced users perfectly. The entire amount of options and functionalities work very intuitively. The way you think it will work is how it works pretty much all the time. That makes it an easy-to-use piece of software for beginners, but it also fulfills all desires and needs for the more experienced user like myself. Easily create campaign flows, emails and landing pages based on templates using drag-and-drop. Anyone can create beautiful emails, landing pages and campaign flows. And if you're ready to dive into the code yourself, you can go all out in creating templates and custom objects using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Smarty and more. Deployteq also comes with a huge amount of possible extensions that can mostly be installed within one minute. And if you're having questions or trouble getting something done, they also have customer support available in Dutch (and, of course, in English). And if you have a feature request, there's a short line to the development team as they develop their software in-house. They also offer training programs in order to get you off to a flying start using Deployteq. And if you don't want to do the actual work yourself in the end, you can also hire their Campaign Services team to do everything for you. They truly offer the complete package.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
There's not a lot to dislike. If I have to name one thing, maybe the speed of the database when uploading loads of records. Although most marketing software packages have this struggle, it would be nice if uploading 300.000 or more records would take less time. It can now take about an hour, which is not unacceptable but could be improved upon.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
Deployteq helps me out in numerous ways. I handle most of my email marketing activities there, but also marketing automation, personalization, omnichannel communication to other channels, data quality management and more. We even use the landing page functionality to create MVP's to validate future functionalities, improvements and expansions for our website. It also offers easy to configure webhooks so that you can quickly connect other software to Deployteq using an API-connection. It can pretty much do everything I want and need to be at our best for our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: My all-time favourite software for omnichannel marketing automation and orchestration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
The user-friendliness is amazing. It suits both beginners and experienced users perfectly. The entire amount of options and functionalities work very intuitively. The way you think it will work is how it works pretty much all the time. That makes it an easy-to-use piece of software for beginners, but it also fulfills all desires and needs for the more experienced user like myself. Easily create campaign flows, emails and landing pages based on templates using drag-and-drop. Anyone can create beautiful emails, landing pages and campaign flows. And if you're ready to dive into the code yourself, you can go all out in creating templates and custom objects using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Smarty and more. Deployteq also comes with a huge amount of possible extensions that can mostly be installed within one minute. And if you're having questions or trouble getting something done, they also have customer support available in Dutch (and, of course, in English). And if you have a feature request, there's a short line to the development team as they develop their software in-house. They also offer training programs in order to get you off to a flying start using Deployteq. And if you don't want to do the actual work yourself in the end, you can also hire their Campaign Services team to do everything for you. They truly offer the complete package.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
There's not a lot to dislike. If I have to name one thing, maybe the speed of the database when uploading loads of records. Although most marketing software packages have this struggle, it would be nice if uploading 300.000 or more records would take less time. It can now take about an hour, which is not unacceptable but could be improved upon.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
Deployteq helps me out in numerous ways. I handle most of my email marketing activities there, but also marketing automation, personalization, omnichannel communication to other channels, data quality management and more. We even use the landing page functionality to create MVP's to validate future functionalities, improvements and expansions for our website. It also offers easy to configure webhooks so that you can quickly connect other software to Deployteq using an API-connection. It can pretty much do everything I want and need to be at our best for our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent platform to send newsletters, create automated customer journeys and manage your data
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
One of the features is it's easy UI. It makes data selections and automated journeys easy with a drag and drop interface. This way you can map your whole flow by  drawing it in the tool as you go. Without any effort you can create data segments in the profilebuilder which you can use to include or exclude groups in newsletters or journeys and customize the experience for the receiver by splitting journeys through if/else statements to create a different output based on the engagement of the customer.

Through it's API connectors you can link CanopyDeploy to almost any other database and sync data through the digital ecosystem to keep track of any changes.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
When using the datamodel, it's easy to put data in there. But removing it has some challenges. Also creating proper landingpages within the tool does need some frontend development knowledge.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
You can use it as a customer engagement platform by measuring the activity throughout different touchpoint in the customerlifecycle. You can combine activity in the newsletters in the customerjourneys and create a personal outcome based on clicks, selected preferences or other metrics that you have within the data. Therefor giving the customer a personalised journey suiting their current situation or their preferences.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely user friendly, surprisingly powerful Customer engagement platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
Things that are excellent:
* Deployteq (formerly CanopyDeploy) distinguishes itself from the competition by its user-friendliness. The interface is easy-to-learn and clean.
* The different parts of the solution work together very well. You can feel the software is well thought out.
* The platform is surprisingly powerful. Using the Campaign Designer you can build flexible, versatile customer journeys, all while using different channels and external sources
* You can use the platform without having to write a single line of code (SQL, Javascript, XML) once your template is set up.
* Don't underestimate: Tech Support. Quick responses, located at headquarters (no outsourcing to India), you can pick up the phone and talk to an actual human being.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
Items that could improve:
* Only for more tech-savvy: the tool doesn't offer direct database access. There's no option to write your own SQL queries.
* If you request bespoke functionality development time from the Deployteq team is required, so there might be a waiting time (although time to market is quicker compared to others).
* The Analytics Dashboarding could use clarification on Data sources

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
* Versatile allround Customer engagement platform.
* The platform increases efficiency, saving money and time.
* One-stop shop for different online channels.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_title: A very user friendly ESP
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
The user friendliness and intuitiveness of the system. The system works very intuitively and anyone can create emails and campaigns relatively easy and quickly.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
the stability could be better and the system has some closed areas where users cannot enter and edit, for instance. Which means contact with the supplier is needed

Recommendations to others considering Deployteq:
If your strategy is to create a "Best of breed"-stack and are in the market for ESP/marketing automation, then I would really recommend CanopyDeploy as it is a very complete, intuitive, versatile, and easy-to-use tool that your marketers will love. I would recommend

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest problem we solved by using CanopyDeploy is to make it possible for our marketers to create emails on the fly, by themselves, without any technical or design assistance. In the past we used to have to create more content by our visual designers and now we can create effective communication by just using the content we already have and use that. With the drag and drop system we can very easily create emails and with the very easy campaign designing tool we can easily create automated marketing campaigns. Another problem is being solved by the webhook system, which makes it easy for a marketer to connect CanopyDeploy to just about any other tool. In the past we would have needed technical capacity for this and now the marketers can manage that.

all_reviews.review_title: User friendly Marketing Automation software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
Very user-friendly software to use in your marketing department. A solo e-mail marketer can start sending simple weekly newsletters to automate their marketing activities fully. There is a lot of competition in this market, but both the support team and the tool itself help in our daily work. There are a lot of extra additions you can install from their in-app store to connect, for example Trustpilot or other external tools. It's straightforward to connect your  data via webhook/API as well.

I have been using CanopyDeploy for a few years now, and I am definitely not the most tech-savvy person, but we can very easily use the tool in our activities and make revenue. I am especially fond of the modeling in the campaign editor to make automate flows.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
ITG has a vital tool with CanopyDeploy, but they also have an obvious business model; anything not in the tool itself will cost you extra (for example, template design and extra reporting features). This might be a hurdle for smaller organizations without an additional budget.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have used CanopyDeploy for all our marketing campaigns, and we can see the results already in a short amount of time. The engagement and retention value of our customers both went up and the automation of (simple) marketing campaigns already helped retain the customer for a longer time.

all_reviews.review_title: User-friendly and great for Marketing automation!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
Very user-friendly software, for building single newsletters or automated e-mailcampaigns. I work with CanopyDeploy everyday and the it offers me enough advanced functions to built campaigns as complicated as I want, which gives me a lot of selfcontrol in what I want to built and/or create. Some of my collegues do not work with CanopyDeploy everyday, but still find there way through the system very quick and are able to create single newsletters very easily. Also the supportdesk is very hands-on and helpful. They answers your questions very quickly.

-The possibilities of the system can sometimes not be easy to oversee. You need to work a lot with CanopyDeploy to fully profit.

- Marketing Automation: sending a lot of e-mails with campaigns, so I have more time to focus on other things.
- Personalisation: CanopyDeploy is making it very easy to personalize e-mails and make all your e-mails unique.

all_reviews.review_title: CanopyDeploy enables me to really automate (email) marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
As a long-time CanopyDeploy user, I like the look and feel and I think it's very intuitive. It gives me the possibility to create stuff without the need to use any code at all, but if I want to, I can make use of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Smarty, and even AMP. Because of this, I have the freedom to create basically everything that helps me with Marketing Automation and makes it easy to try new stuff and test this. Being able to connect to many APIs and get things to and from CanopyDeploy to other systems in several easy ways makes CanopyDeploy very flexible as well.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
There aren't many examples to take new users through the possibilities, and it would be great if there's documentation about the supported Smarty functions and modifiers in CanopyDeploy.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've reduced production time regarding emails and landing pages by creating drag & drop templates. These templates are easy to use by colleagues. It gives us the time to work on more complex campaigns like a  feedback process in email without 3rd party tooling or a tool where customers can report damage to their business assets. These are just a small number of things we've achieved with and in CanopyDeploy. Because we can build all kinds of tools and processes in CanopyDeploy, we can learn already and buy time for our development team before they start implementing these tools in, for example, the website.

all_reviews.review_title: Best marketing automation software, period
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
The flexibility to make just about anything you can imagine. CanopyDeploy is like a LEGO set for marketing automation: the only limit is your own creativity. Out of the box you can create intricate email/SMS-campaigns, build your own database and use it as CRM. Then there's the integrations (add-ons) that enable you to connect third party software (for instance Facebook, SalesForece or a webshop) or a webhook.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
* Making forms that you can use on your own websites and using the data from these forms in CanopyDeploy is a bit cumbersome.
* Because of all the possibilities and features it can be overwhelming for new users (although Team ITG offers great hands-on courses).
* I feel the analytics functions are a bit lacking

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're a marketing driven organization, we use CanopyDeploy for everything. Marketing emails with several campaign options depending where you click, raffle draws, generating attendence certificates, sending SMS to our attendees, all fed from the CRM.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Deployteq?
Canopy Deploy may not be the first CRM software tooling that comes to mind as a starting entrepreneur. Yet last year we started Canopy Deploy and as a CRM system. And we are very happy with it. The software is very easy and intuitive and even for us, with no background as an email marketer, the program works easily. In addition, the people of ITG are very professional and helpful. Thanks to the collaboration with ITG and Canopy Deploy, we can take faster steps than with other CRM packages. Canopy Deploy has become part of our success for us.

What do you dislike about Deployteq?
Fantastic CRM program, a real solution for us as starting entrepreneurs.

What problems is Deployteq solving and how is that benefiting you?
* Building a CRM system with unprecedented possibilities
* Build several flows in the blink of an eye
* Extremely easy to use
